name: Lionel Messi
comment: I loved the color of the cleats they contrasted well and the cleat fit well on my foot

name: Cristiano Ronaldo
comment: Fits like a glove. Very light and comfortable. I feel like I have amazing control of the ball.

name: Neymar Jr.
comment: This is my first pair of cleats that are of high quality and just fit perfect

name: Kylian Mbapp√©
comment: Great boots, true to size but a little tight in the midfoot but this fixes itself after a few hours of playing.

name: Mesut Ozil
comment: Super lightweight. Fits like a sock! Great traction when changing direction. I went a size and a half up

name: Mauro Icardi
comment: Had to return it in the end, due to it not fitting as well as I wanted it. Nice looking and features boot otherwise
